actions.recommendation: Colonoscopy: At the age of 50, we recommend a screening colonoscopy and gastroscopy to detect any changes that present a future risk for cancer.
Abdominal ultrasound recommended , liver enzymes abnormalities.

Well done with your weight loss so far. Losing weight, particularly abdominal fat, can have great overall health benefits. Focus on whole, real, unprocessed foods, practice good sleep hygiene try manage your stress as poor sleep and chronic stress are associated with weight gain.
Rectal bleeding always warrants further assessment and medical advice. Please see your family doctor as soon as possible.
